title: PRESS RELEASE: DECLARATION OF STATUS
text:
13:42 CET PRESS RELEASE: DECLARATION OF STATUS By Ghana FA 
The following players and club officials are requested to appear before the GFA Players' Status Committee at the FA's Secretariat on Thursday 15th October, 2015 at 1:00 pm. 
C268 ANOINTING FC - AFIENYA CITY FCC306 ABRAHAM ANANG - ACCRA GREAT OLYMPICS FCC311 NEW TOWN YOUTH FC - ADUANA STARS FCC312 ANKARA SPORTING CLUB - NEW EDUBIASE FCC320 AMIDAUS PROFS. - DANIEL GORZA - DREAMS FCC322 GARIBA AMIDU - WA AFRICA UNITED FCC333 YUSIF ALI - BEREKUM CHELSEA FCC335 BISMARK IDAN - NEW EDUBIASE UNITED FCC338 DAUDA MOHAMMED - CORNERSTONE FCC340 KYLE KWESI YEMOH - YOUTH SOCCER EXCHANGEC342 TANKO ISSAKA - REAL ATHLETICOC343 SULLEY MUSTAPHA - NEWYORK ACADEMY FCC344 STEPHEN ACQUAH - ZAYTUNA FCC345 JOHN OWOO NANIA FCC346 MOHAMMED ABDUL FATAWU - RIGHT TO DREAM ACADEMY 
C347 RAYMOND NYARKO - PUREJOY FCC348 RACHEL AJUA BOATENMA OTENG - MAWUENA LADIESC349 KWABENA TWUMASI - ABUSUA DWARFS SCC351 PROSPER DONKOR - BECHEM UNITED FCC352 AKZIAMAGNO KOSSI - OMANFOFRO FCC353 PATRICK ANTWI - ABUSUA DWARFS SCC354 ERIC OSEI - ISTANBUL FCC355 ABOAGYE DACOSTA - ISTANBUL FCC356 AMARCHIE FELIX - ISTANBUL FCC357 ELIASU MOHAMMED - AMIDAUS PROFESSIONAL
